languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Физический урон{/g}, нанесенный этому существу, больше не снижается на 50%. Этот эффект длится 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: この生物に与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}を50%減少することはできなくなる。この効果は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}続く。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物に与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}は−80%減少できなくなるり、与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}は−40%減少できなくなる。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間続く。

languages.text: 对此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}不再降低50%。此效果持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物承受的{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}不再降低80%，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}也不再降低40%。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} infligido a esta criatura ya no se reduce un −50 %. Este efecto dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} infligido a esta criatura ya no se reduce un −80 % ni el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} un −40 %. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physischer Schaden{/g}, der dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, wird nicht mehr um −50 % verringert. Dieser Effekt dauert 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang an.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Cette créature ne bénéficie plus de la réduction de −50 % appliquée aux {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} qu'elle subit. Cet effet dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature ne bénéficie plus des réductions de -80 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} et de -40 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qu'elle subit. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Cette créature ne bénéficie plus de la réduction de −50 % appliquée aux {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} qu'elle subit. Cet effet dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.translation_comment:
III глава. Локация CommorraghArena.
Уникальный бафф друкари-прозелитов из 2-й фазы второго боя. Накладывается, если существо с фичей Mantle of Agony получило урон от пси-паверов. Ничего не делает, является маркером для Игрока.

languages.text: Bu yaratığa verilen {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}fiziksel hasar{/g} artık %50 azalmaz. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g} dealt to this creature is no longer reduced by −50%. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
